io.sphere.sdk.common.models

Class LocalizedString

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.common.models.LocalizedString

  • @Immutable
public class LocalizedString
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper around an attribute which can be translated into a number of locales. Note that even if your project only uses one language some attributes (name and description for example) will be always be LocalizedString.
